word: H4550 - מַסַּע - maççaʻ - mas-sah' - Journey - பயணம்

sections.paragraph: a pulling up (of stakes), breaking camp, setting out, a journey
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H5265; a departure (from striking the tents), that is, march (not necessarily a single day’s travel); by implication a station (or point of departure): - journey (-ing).
Cognate: H4550, H4551, H5265
